DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated cholelithiasis American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) I II No previous operation upper abdomen Body mass index ( BMI ) Cholecystitis ASA > II BMI > 30 Previous operation upper abdomen Previous operation intestine Smokers Alcohol Drugs
